body: PG 32 - 34, you better read carefully. (pg 32 "I am only unfaithful in my dreams.")(pg 33 "You better wake up soon, or I'd do it for real.") (pg 34 "I'm sorry Kei-kun, I'd never cheat.") Also the guy, has a kind of sickness wherein his body just shuts down (As explained in Onegai Sensei series) and he's not the only one affected by this "rare" disease.
It not a dream dumbass, you can clearly see cum dripping out of her pussy, fuck you bitchs need glasses. F that guy is dead, Be Gone Thot.

「Authors have different fantasies and writing ideas. If you are displeased by NTR, I would like to suggest for you to start learning how to draw and to write a coherent sentence.

Everyone has a right to free speech, by criticizing the work you have just read, you have exercised your right to free speech. I would like for you and for other people to keep in mind thag I am not outright slandering you, but giving you helpful constructive criticism. 」
